com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.decks.2016: This deck is ready for battle anytime! Enter the ring with big brawlers like Machamp-EX and Marowak, plus Strong Energy and some great Trainer cards!
Get ready for a Shatter Shot showdown with Mewtwo-EX and Meowstic in this energetic deck, with the help of Mystery Energy and some great Trainer cards!
Unlock the potential of little Magikarp and the power of the raging seas! This deck features Shiny Gyarados-EX and Regice, plus Splash Energy and some great Trainer cards!

com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: If this Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 80 more damage. Then, remove all Special Conditions from this Pokémon.
Switch all damage counters on this Pokémon with those on your opponent's Active Pokémon.
This attack does 30 damage times the amount of {P} Energy attached to this Pokémon.
This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
This attack does 20 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokémon. This Pokémon is now Confused.
Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, search your deck for a {W} Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
